title: MEAS ES_APPM 311-3-20 Methods of Applied Mathematics: Complex Variables

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Imaginary numbers and complex variables, analytic functions, calculus of complex functions, contour integration with application to transform inversion, and conformal mapping. ES_APPM 311-3 may be taken independently of ES_APPM 311-1,2.

subject: ES_APPM
